00321 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00322     Reader::GetPtr
00323 
00324     Allows computation of a pointer which points exactly one byte behind
00325     the buffer. GetNoBytesReadable() will return 0 in this case, so a
00326     memcpy() will not read bad data in this case.
00327     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00328 ObexBuffer::DataPtr ObexBuffer::Reader::GetPtr()
00329 const
00330 {
00331     ASSERT_DEBUG( m_offset <= m_buffer.GetSize() );
00332 
00333     return  m_buffer.GetPtrAt(m_offset);
00334 }// GetPtr
00335 
00336 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00337     Reader::GetOffset
00338     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00339 ObexBuffer::Size            ObexBuffer::Reader::GetOffset()
00340 const
00341 {
00342     return  m_offset;
00343 }// GetOffset
00344 
00345 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00346     Writer::GetPtr
00347 
00348     Allows computation of a pointer which points exactly one byte behind
00349     the buffer. GetNoBytesWritable() will return 0 in this case, so a
00350     memcpy() will not overwrite memory in this case.
00351     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00352 ObexBuffer::DataPtr         ObexBuffer::Writer::GetPtr()
00353 const
00354 {
00355     ASSERT_DEBUG( (m_buffer.GetSize() <= m_buffer.GetCapacity()) );
00356 
00357     return  m_buffer.GetPtrAt( m_buffer.GetSize() );
00358 }// GetPtr
00359 
00360 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00361     Writer::GetOffset
00362     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00363 ObexBuffer::Size    ObexBuffer::Writer::GetOffset()
00364 const
00365 {
00366     return  m_buffer.GetSize();
00367 }// GetOffset
00368 
00369 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00370     IsValid
00371     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00372 BOOLEAN     ObexBuffer::IsValid()
00373 const
00374 {
00375     return ( m_data_ptr != 0 );
00376 }// IsValid
00377

00396 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------

00398     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00399 void    ObexBuffer::Empty()

00401     m_data_size = 0;
00402 }// Empty
00403 
00404 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00405     Release
00406     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00407 void    ObexBuffer::Release()
00408 {

00410     Reset();
00411 }// Release

00413 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00414     GetPtrAt
00415     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00416 ObexBuffer::DataPtr     ObexBuffer::GetPtrAt(Size   where)
00417 const
00418 {
00419     ASSERT_DEBUG( IsValid() );
00420 
00421     return  &( m_data_ptr[where] );
00422 }// GetPtrAt
